content:
I am still getting errors in the IG build that I thought would have been resolved by now. For example

Path Severity Message
MDCnotObject error Error from server: Unable to provide support for code system urn:iso:std:iso:11073:10101
ASN1measurement error Error from server: Unable to provide support for code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/phd/CodeSystem/ASN1ToHL7
URL value 'http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pocd/CodeSystem/measurement-status' does not resolve
The fixed value has type 'uri' which is not valid (valid type: [canonical]) [It is http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/phd/StructureDefinition/PhdDevice]
The fixed value has type 'uri' which is not valid (It is "MR" which is a V2 code. Why is it considered a URI?
I don't have enough context to answer this question. what location is that error reported against?
